name: Patintero
description:
What is Patintero? 

Patintero is a Filipino game played by two teams: Offense/Runners vs Defense/Blockers. This game is a simplified black and white version of Patintero where 2 players use the same PC and keyboard to play. 

How to Play: 

For mechanics and controls, press the Patintero panel in the menu. 

Note: The game is a little buggy. Feedback is appreciated!
